nr.co.sngforge.java2r
Class RBase

java.lang.Object
  nr.co.sngforge.java2r.RBase

public class RBase
extends java.lang.Object

This class forms the basic port to the R executable. It can be used for interacting with R.

Field Summary
static int LESS_QUIET
          Parameter to specify that R runs in the silent mode.
static int NOT_QUIET
          Parameter to specify that R runs in normal mode.
static int VERY_QUIET
          Parameter to specify that R runs in the slave and silent mode.

protected  void finalize()
          This method ensures that R has exited successfully before the RBase object is destroyed.

Field Detail

VERY_QUIET

public static final int VERY_QUIET
Parameter to specify that R runs in the slave and silent mode. In this case it gives the least messages.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LESS_QUIET

public static final int LESS_QUIET
Parameter to specify that R runs in the silent mode. In this case it gives some messages.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NOT_QUIET

public static final int NOT_QUIET
Parameter to specify that R runs in normal mode. In this case it gives all messages.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

RBase

public RBase(RFactory rf,
             java.io.OutputStream out,
             java.io.OutputStream err,
             int q)
      throws java.io.IOException
Constructor to instantiate an object of this class.

Parameters:
rf - The RFactory object that has already been initialized.
out - The OutputStream to print the normal standard output(stdout) messages of R. Can be System.out or System.err also.
err - The OutputStream to print the error output(stderr) messages of R. Can be System.out or System.err also.
q - The quietness level in which R will be run.
The follwing values may be used
  • RBase.LESS_QUIET
  • RBase.NOT_QUIET
  • RBase.VERY_QUIET
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error in redirecting the IO Streams.
Method Detail

execute

public void execute(java.lang.String cmd)
This command executes the command in R.

Parameters:
cmd - The command exactly in the same form as R

finalize

protected void finalize()
This method ensures that R has exited successfully before the RBase object is destroyed.

Overrides:
finalize in class java.lang.Object
